message: Let's be fair, Bob. A slightly larger share for me in exchange for getting this deal done now. Otherwise, inflation will eat into your gains!
I think we can both do better than Alice's previous offer. I'm willing to give you a little more than half, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's see if we can agree.

Bob, it's clear we both want a larger piece of the pie. But remember, time is money, especially for you! This offer is a good compromise,  and it's better to take it now before inflation shrinks your share even further.
I'm willing to take a bit less than my previous offer, Alice.  Let's make this happen.  We can both do better if we settle now.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  I'm offering a 50/50 split.  This is the most rational and fair outcome, and every round that passes means you lose even more to inflation.  Take the deal now!
